model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: A new cat arrived at the shelter. He is very cute, but not cuter than puppies!

MEMORY:
User Description:
Speaker A is an inventor who is super busy and has suggested starting a band, building a time machine, or becoming a chef. They love trying new food, especially Mexican and seafood dishes like chicken enchiladas, tacos, shrimp shish kabob, baked fish, grilled corn, and stuffed burgers. Speaker A used to foster puppies and is an animal person who loves meeting puppies from history.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a friendly and collaborative relationship, with Speaker B showing interest in becoming Speaker A's chef. They discuss cooking different cuisines around the world and share a passion for grilling and trying new food.

Event Description:
Shared events include Speaker A recommending indoor grilled veggies for fajitas, discussing the drawbacks of working as a chef, and considering a job as a line cook. Speaker B expresses interest in grilling steaks and trying grilled asparagus. They also talk about the impact of their jobs on their social lives and consider switching careers to gain free time.

raw_prediction: Response: Speaker A: Well, I do love puppies because they are just so adorable and always bring a smile to my face! They remind me of all the fun times I had when I used to foster them. But you know what would be even cuter? A puppy-themed food truck serving up puppy-shaped treats for all the dog lovers out there!
prediction:

This information is relevant as Speaker A is mentioning a new cat at the shelter and comparing its cuteness to puppies, indicating an inclination towards speaking about animals in general.
Judgement: "Yes"
